title: The Successful Millennial: Tips for Navigating the Corporate Jungle
description: Millennials, this book is for you! More than 100 tips are provided to help you navigate more proficiently in the corporate workplace with colleagues and leaders, and become recognized for your expertise and style. It's one thing to bring your energy, enthusiasm, and ideas to work, but getting people to listen to you and recognize you for your work contributions is going to help you build a successful career.
author: Emily Nightingale
